page.shortlink: grid component client side onrowfocus event
page.description: Fires when a Grid row gets focus. This event is only available for editable Grids.
page.discussion: The *[js:onRowFocus]* event is triggered when a row in an editable Grid Component receives focus. For non-editable Grids, see [onRowSelect].

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: rowNumber
property.description: The row number of the Grid row that fired the event. New record rows have negative row numbers.
